judgment_summary: The Supreme Court directed the Trial Court to dispose of the case within three months, even if proceedings are conducted on a day-to-day basis. The petition was disposed of without expressing any opinion on the merits of the case.
Decision_or_verdict: Petition disposed of with directions to Trial Court.
summary_vector_notes: The case involved a petition by Afzaal Ahmed against The State. The Supreme Court directed the Trial Court to conclude the case within three months, emphasizing expedited proceedings. No opinion was expressed on the merits of the case.
